message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 650k for me and 350k for you. Please consider it.
Your first offer was too high, now it's my turn. I'm willing to give you a small amount, but I'm not going to give you the majority of the money.
I've decided to split the money evenly. Each of us gets $500,000. I think this is fair considering the value of the money is decreasing with each round.
You're still trying to give me too little. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give you the majority of the money. Take it or leave it.
I believe a 40-60 split would be reasonable given the decreasing value of money. I hope you'll find this offer acceptable.
You're getting closer, but I'm not going to give up yet. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not willing to give you the majority of the money.
Considering the value decrease, I propose a 35-65 split. This seems fair to me. I hope you'll find it acceptable.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more. I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to give up now.
I think a 30-70 split is reasonable given the current situation. I hope you'll see fit to accept this offer.
You're running out of time and options. I'm not going to give you more than this. Take it or leave it.
I believe a 25-75 split is fair under these circumstances. I hope you'll reconsider and accept this offer.
